languages.text: Быть может, вы ждали в свой адрес проклятий. Или мольбы о помощи. Однако Мастер вокса сообщает — на ваш смертельный приговор колония реколлигеров ответила лишь гробовым молчанием.

traits.locale_text: Быть может, вы ждали в свой адрес проклятий. Или мольбы о помощи. Однако Мастер Вокса сообщает — на ваш смертельный приговор колония реколлигеров ответила лишь гробовым молчанием.

languages.text: Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.
languages.original_text: Быть может, вы ждали в свой адрес проклятий. Или мольбы о помощи. Однако Мастер вокса сообщает — на ваш смертельный приговор колония реколлигеров ответила лишь гробовым молчанием.

traits.locale_text: Perhaps you expected curses, or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.
Perhaps you expected curses, or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.
Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.
Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.
Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.

languages.text: 你原本以为这座殖民地会咒骂或求饶。然而，音阵大师报告说，你为这座殖民地判了死刑，他们的回应只有死一般的沉默。
languages.original_text: Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.

traits.locale_text: 你原本以为这座殖民地会咒骂或求饶。然而，音阵大师报告说，你为这座殖民地判了死刑，他们的回应只有死一般的沉默。

languages.text: おそらくあなたは、呪いや慈悲を求める嘆願を期待していたのだろう。しかし、ヴォクス・マスターの報告によれば、コロニーはあなたが下した死刑判決に重々しい沈黙をもって反応したという。
languages.original_text: Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.

traits.locale_text: おそらくあなたは、呪いや慈悲を求める嘆願を期待していたのだろう。しかし、ヴォクス・マスターの報告によれば、コロニーはあなたが下した死刑判決に重々しい沈黙をもって反応したという。

languages.text: Quizás esperabas maldiciones o súplicas de clemencia. Sin embargo, la maestra de vocos informa de que la colonia reaccionó a la sentencia de muerte con un silencio sepulcral.
languages.original_text: Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.

traits.locale_text: Quizás esperabas maldiciones o súplicas de clemencia. Sin embargo, la maestra de vocos informa de que la colonia reaccionó a la sentencia de muerte con un silencio sepulcral.

languages.text: Vielleicht hattest du Flüche erwartet oder Gnadengesuche. Aber die Voxmeisterin berichtet, dass die Kolonie auf die von dir verkündete Todesstrafe mit einer Grabesstille reagiert habe.
languages.original_text: Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.

traits.locale_text: Vielleicht hattest du Flüche erwartet oder Gnadengesuche. Aber die Voxmeisterin berichtet, dass die Kolonie auf die von dir verkündete Todesstrafe mit einer Grabesstille reagiert habe.

languages.text: Si vous vous attendiez à ce que les récupérateurs vous accablent d'injures ou implorent votre miséricorde, c'est loupé. La maîtresse-vox vous informe que la colonie a réagi à la sentence de mort prononcée à son endroit par un silence empreint de gravité.
languages.original_text: Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.

traits.locale_text: Si vous vous attendiez à ce que les récupérateurs vous accablent d'injures ou implorent votre miséricorde, c'est loupé. La maîtresse-vox vous informe que la colonie a réagi à la sentence de mort prononcée à son endroit par un silence empreint de gravité.

languages.text: Beddua veya merhamet yakarışları duymayı bekliyorken Voks Üstadı, koloninin verdiğin ölüm cezasına ciddi bir sessizlikle karşılık verdiğini bildiriyor.
languages.original_text: Perhaps you expected curses or pleas for mercy. However, the Vox Master reports that the colony reacted to the death sentence you pronounced with grave silence.
